Megatron Revived/ Malice/ Injustice/ Wolfblade:
 
Megatron swung his cannon around and took aim on Nightstrike.  He fired, barely grazing the minion but enough to get his attention.
 
Wolfblade knelt next to Malice and tried to see what was wrong with him.  He pushed her away, and stumbled back, still clutching his head.  Injustice managed to get up, his wound regenerating.
"Uh, guys, I need a little help here," Wolfblade called into her comm link to someone who could reach her soon.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Hydras/NightStrike/


"we must protect the cannon with our lives!!!!!"shouted angryly 
Hydras


Nightstrike fkew towards the cannon and he opned fire against it
